Download a File from ENTSO-E SFTP Server

Source: R/entsoe_sftp.R
entsoe_download_file.Rd

This function downloads a specified file from the ENTSO-E SFTP server using the provided credentials.

Usage

entsoe_download_file(
  basis_name,
  year,
  month,
  user = Sys.getenv("ENTSOE_USER"),
  password = Sys.getenv("ENTSOE_PASSWORD"),
  output_file
)

Arguments

basis_name

A character string specifying the high-level folder name of the file.

year

An integer specifying the year of the file to retrieve.

month

An integer specifying the month of the file to retrieve (e.g., 1 for January).

user

A character string for the username for SFTP authentication.

password

A character string for the password for SFTP authentication.

output_file

A character string specifying the local file path where the downloaded file will be saved.

Value

Logical value indicating whether the file was downloaded successfully.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Download a file for specified parameters
download_successful <- download_entsoe_file(basis_name = "example_folder", year = 2023, month = 1,
                                              user = Sys.getenv("ENTSOE_USER"),
                                              password = Sys.getenv("ENTSOE_PASSWORD"),
                                              output_file = "local_file_path.csv")
} # }
